typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1000) ~> source1
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		Store_StoreIdStoreId as string,
		Store_StoreIdStoreName as string,
		Store_StoreIdLocationId as string,
		Store_StoreIdLastModifiedDate as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdPointOfSaleId as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdPointOfSaleName as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdPointOfSaleDescription as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdStore_StoreIdStoreId as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdStore_StoreIdStoreName as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdStore_StoreIdLocationId as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdStore_StoreIdLastModifiedDate as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdPointOfSaleNote as string,
		PointOfSale_PointOfSaleIdLastModifiedDate as string,
		Customer_CustomerIdCustomerId as string,
		Customer_CustomerIdCustomerEstablishedDate as string,
		Customer_CustomerIdLastModifiedDate as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		CustomerAccount_CustomerAccountIdCustomerAccountId as string,
		CustomerAccount_CustomerAccountIdCustomer_CustomerIdCustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccount_CustomerAccountIdCustomer_CustomerIdCustomerEstablishedDate as string,
		CustomerAccount_CustomerAccountIdCustomer_CustomerIdLastModifiedDate as string,
		CustomerAccount_CustomerAccountIdLastModifiedDate as string,
		LastModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
SurrogateKey2, SurrogateKey1 join(txid == movieid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select1 keyGenerate(output(movieid as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source2 keyGenerate(output(txid as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		SalesChannelId = movie,
		PurchasingChannelId = title,
		genres,
		StoreId = year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	entity: 'Transaction.cdm.json/Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	corpusPath: 'CDMfolders/corpus',
	folderPath: 'CDMfolders/Transaction',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		SalesChannelId,
		PurchasingChannelId,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp,
		TransactionAmount,
		LoyaltyProgramId,
		LoyaltyAccountId,
		StoreId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
